name: Captain Wifi
description:
Controls:  (we forgot to show this in the game)

WASD - move

Left Click - punch

Right Click - laser beam

Space - pause

You play as Captain Wifi, a superhero that gets stronger if he has a WiFi connection. One day, the evil Pirate Jellies attacked, leaving the city of Hot Spot without a consistent internet connection! Use the last remaining phone hotspots in the city to defeat the jellies and their pirate leader!

GitHub link: https://github.com/HoodieSticks/Pirate-Jellies

Created by Team Pirate Jellies for Extra Credits Game Jam #4 (following the theme of "Connection"). Coded in Python, using the Pygame library.

Go easy on us. 3 of the 4 of us have never been in a game jam before, and 2 of us had never made games before.

Note: Some older versions of Windows might not have the right DLL files to run this game. I don't really know what to do about it.
